comments.body: Fixed a longstanding issue with these DTSLint assertions
Why did this and `shape.bar` below it need to be changed to both be nullable?

To be honest I'm not sure why this wasn't needed before. It came up as an error so I happily patched it, because `| null` is the more correct type (`PropTypes.string` would allow `null` through). I understand that it may not be desirable from a practical standpoint, but maybe the better way to resolve that is to remove `|null` from the `Requireable` type? At least that way it's implemented in a consistent way (notice that the root-level optional type *already* had to include `null`; the change now is that nested types match the same behaviour)
